mapper.sql: CPN_OID, CPN_TYPE, AMOUNT, CPN_TIME, CONFIRMED, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_BY, SEQ_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CONSUMPTION(CPN_TYPE, AMOUNT, CPN_TIME, CONFIRMED, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY) VALUES (#{cpnType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cpnTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{confirmed,jdbcType=BIT}, #{baseObject.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{baseObject.createBy,jdbcType=NVARCHAR})
mapper.update:
UPDATE CONSUMPTION
SEQ_NO = SEQ_NO + 1,
CPN_TYPE = #{cpnType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CPN_TIME = #{cpnTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CONFIRMED = #{confirmed,jdbcType=BIT},
CREATE_TIME = #{baseObject.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{baseObject.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{baseObject.createBy,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
UPDATE_BY = #{baseObject.updateBy,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
WHERE CPN_OID = #{cpnOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND SEQ_NO = #{baseObject.seqNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

UPDATE CONSUMPTION SET SEQ_NO = SEQ_NO + 1, CPN_TYPE = #{cpnType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CPN_TIME = #{cpnTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CONFIRMED = #{confirmed,jdbcType=BIT}, CREATE_TIME = #{baseObject.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{baseObject.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_BY = #{baseObject.createBy,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, UPDATE_BY = #{baseObject.updateBy,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} WHERE CPN_OID = #{cpnOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND SEQ_NO = #{baseObject.seqNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
